name: elevate-web-extension
description: Chrome Opera extension adding features for Strava website with new performances data and improved ergonomics. Made with AngularJs, UnderscoreJs and Bootstrap

scripts.archive: node -e "const bestzip = require('bestzip');const manifest = require('./dist/manifest.json');const fs = require('fs');const cwd = process.cwd() + '/dist/';const target = 'package/';const filename = 'v' + manifest.version_name.split(' ').join('_').toLowerCase() + '_' + (function now() {const pad = (num) => {return (num).toString().padStart(2, '0');}, d = new Date();return d.getFullYear() + '-' + pad(d.getMonth() + 1) + '-' + pad(d.getDate()) + '-' + pad(d.getHours()) + '-' + pad(d.getMinutes());}()) + '.zip';const output = '../' + target + filename;if (!fs.existsSync(target)) fs.mkdirSync(target);bestzip.nodeZip({source: '*', cwd: cwd, destination: output}).then(() => {console.log('Generated archive ' + filename);process.exit(0);}).catch((err) => {console.error(err.stack);process.exit(1);});"
scripts.build:metadata: node -e "console.log('{\"commit\": \"' + require('child_process').execSync('git rev-parse HEAD').toString().trim() + '\", \"date\": \"' + (new Date()).toISOString() + '\"}')" > build_metadata.json
scripts.build:appcore@dev: npm run build:metadata && cd ../appcore/ && node ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng --version && node ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build --outputPath=../webextension/dist/app/
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm-run-all extension-res-copy:* && npm-run-all --print-label --parallel watch:appcore watch:extension

author: Thomas Champagne
